name: Medir Inc
description: Operator of online medical care and prescription drug delivery platform intended to serve medical consumers, hospitals, and pharmacies. The company's platform offers a structure in which a delivery person delivers prescription drugs to users at a pharmacy close to the hospital where they received treatment and a hyperlocal policy that only exposes nearby hospitals based on their location, enabling patients to get treatment safely and quickly from the specialists in their neighborhood.
